H3.text: what do people speak in canada. French Language

A4.text: English and French are the mother tongues of 56.6% and 20.2% of Canadians respectively.

A5.text: New Brunswick has been officially bilingual since the 1960s, and Nova Scotia recognized Mi'kmawi'simk as the first language of the province in 2022.

A6.text: Linguistic maps of Canada with 50 indigenous languages
